it.unipr.netsec.nemo.link

Class PacketGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.net.NetInterface
      • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.link.LinkInterface
        • it.unipr.netsec.nemo.link.DataLinkInterface
          • it.unipr.netsec.nemo.link.PacketGenerator

  • public class PacketGenerator
extends DataLinkInterface
    A pair of IP nodes attached to two links. It can can be used for generating packets from the first node (sender) to the second node (target). .

      • PacketGenerator

        public PacketGenerator(DataLink tx_link,
                       Address tx_addr)
        Creates a new packet generator.
        Parameters:
        tx_link - the link where the generator sender is attached to
        tx_addr - the interface address of the sender

      • PacketGenerator

        public PacketGenerator(DataLink tx_link,
                       Address tx_addr,
                       DataLink rx_link,
                       Address rx_addr)
        Creates a new packet generator.
        Parameters:
        tx_link - the link where the generator sender is attached to
        tx_addr - the interface address of the sender
        rx_link - the link where the generator receiver is attached to
        rx_addr - the interface address of the receiver

    • Method Detail

      • send

        public void send(Packet pkt,
                 Address dst_addr,
                 long num,
                 long inter_millisec,
                 PacketGenerator.Listener listener)
        Sends a number of packets.
        Parameters:
        pkt - the packet to be sent
        dst_addr - the destination interface
        num - the number of packets
        inter_millisec - the time to wait between the end of a transmission and the begin of the next one, in milliseconds
        listener - listener of the packet generator
